name: Save Bidsketch clients to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new client is created in Bidsketch, Make will automatically add that client to your Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/11PjS78CSImia-k1QBV9rzABZwplDfG_DHuN6XzY0eFw/edit?usp=sharing).
